entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:56 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 07:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High zero.
entry.summary: Overcast. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 07:36 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
